name: ofldtos

stmt.origin: syl(wcel(c0, cofld), wcel(c0, ctos), wcel(c0, comnd))
stmt.pretty: syl(c0 ∈ oField, c0 ∈ Toset, c0 ∈ oMnd)

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cofld), wcel(c0, ctos))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cofld), wcel(c0, comnd))
-| wi(wcel(c0, comnd), wcel(c0, ctos))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ oField → c0 ∈ Toset)
⊣ (c0 ∈ oField → c0 ∈ oMnd)
⊣ (c0 ∈ oMnd → c0 ∈ Toset)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cofld), wcel(c0, ctos))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cofld), wcel(c0, comnd))
-| wi(wcel(c0, comnd), wcel(c0, ctos))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ oField → c0 ∈ Toset)
⊣ (c0 ∈ oField → c0 ∈ oMnd)
⊣ (c0 ∈ oMnd → c0 ∈ Toset)

body.origin:

body.pretty:

⊣ (c0 ∈ oField → c0 ∈ oRing)

cumulated.origin:

stmt.origin: simprbi(wcel(c0, cofld), wcel(c0, corng), wcel(c0, cfield))
stmt.pretty: simprbi(c0 ∈ oField, c0 ∈ oRing, c0 ∈ Field)

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cofld), wcel(c0, corng))
-| wb(wcel(c0, cofld), wa(wcel(c0, cfield), wcel(c0, corng)))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ oField → c0 ∈ oRing)
⊣ (c0 ∈ oField ↔(c0 ∈ Field ∧ c0 ∈ oRing))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cofld), wcel(c0, ctos))
-| wi(wcel(c0, comnd), wcel(c0, ctos))
-| wi(wcel(c0, corng), wcel(c0, cogrp))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cogrp), wcel(c0, comnd))
-| wb(wcel(c0, cofld), wa(wcel(c0, cfield), wcel(c0, corng)))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ oField → c0 ∈ Toset)
⊣ (c0 ∈ oMnd → c0 ∈ Toset)
⊣ (c0 ∈ oRing → c0 ∈ oGrp)
⊣ (c0 ∈ oGrp → c0 ∈ oMnd)
⊣ (c0 ∈ oField ↔(c0 ∈ Field ∧ c0 ∈ oRing))

body.origin: |- wb(wcel(c0, cofld), wa(wcel(c0, cfield), wcel(c0, corng)))

comment: An ordered field is a totally ordered set. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 20-Jan-2018.)
